item.title: Exploring Windows Security: A New Journey
item.description: Exploring Windows Security: A New Journey Welcome to the Windows Security section of my blog! This is where I’ll explore the intricacies of Windows internals, common attack vectors, and defensive techniques. What to Expect Here, I’ll be posting about: Windows Internals: Deep dives into how Windows components work Offensive Techniques: Red team tactics like privilege escalation and persistence Defensive Strategies: Blue team methods, EDR evasion analysis, and hardening guides Detection & Response: Writing Sigma rules, analyzing logs, and using tools like Sysmon Responsible Disclosure Reminder Any vulnerabilities I find related to Windows or associated tools will be disclosed responsibly:
